columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary unique identifier for the address record.

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: Primary address line (local language) — usually street name and number.

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Secondary address line (local language) — apartment, suite or additional info.

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Tertiary address line (local language) — often locality and postal code.

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Fourth address line (local language) — usually country name.

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate for the address (projected or raw numeric coordinate).

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate for the address (projected or raw numeric coordinate).

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Geocoding model type indicator (enumerated code describing match type).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geocoding model used to resolve this address.

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the geocoding search was performed.

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Numeric score indicating the quality/confidence of the geocoding match.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Identifier for the primary street in the geocoding model (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Identifier for the secondary street in the geocoding model (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Geocoding model location identifier (e.g., locality or area id).

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal/ZIP code returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the country table (dbo.Country.ID).

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Raw query string submitted to the geocoding engine (often full-address text).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Primary street name text as returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: House or building number for primary street as returned by geocoder.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Secondary street name text from geocoding (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: House or building number for secondary street from geocoding.

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality or city name as returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude value produced by the geocoding model (stored as text).

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude value produced by the geocoding model (stored as text).

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Codes representing higher-level geographic areas or hierarchies returned by geocoder.

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Postal/ZIP code stored as numeric value for easier numeric filtering and joins.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: District or prefecture name as returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Smaller area or neighborhood name from geocoding results (local language).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management key used to associate this address with external data or staging tables.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source or staging table from which this address was imported.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data management or linkage to external systems.

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Single-character geocode classification type from the geocoding engine.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating whether Line1 was manually overridden by a user (True/False).

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: Primary address line translated to English (if available).

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Secondary address line translated to English (if available).

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Tertiary address line translated to English — often locality and postal code.

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Fourth address line translated to English — usually country name.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Primary street name text as returned by geocoder, translated to English if available.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Secondary street name text from geocoding, translated to English if available.

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality or city name from geocoder translated to English.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: District or prefecture name from geocoding results translated to English.

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area or neighborhood name from geocoding results translated to English.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the English Line1 was manually overridden by a user (True/False).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: House or building number for primary street from geocoding, English field.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: House or building number for secondary street from geocoding, English field.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary unique identifier for the advanced payment policy.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the advanced payment policy.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Detailed description or notes about the payment policy.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User account or system identity that created the policy.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User account or system identity that last modified the policy.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage value used by the advanced payment policy (expressed as percent).

columns.name: Plafon
columns.description: Monetary ceiling (plafon) for the policy — currency amount limit.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Serialized rule expression or logic (XML/workflow) that defines policy conditions.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the policy is currently active (True/False).

columns.name: AdvanceAmountCalculator
columns.description: Optional formula or script used to calculate advance amounts for this policy.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed monetary amount associated with the policy (currency).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the discount policy record.

columns.name: DiscountType
columns.description: Numeric code representing the category or type of discount (business-defined enumeration).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the discount policy (often localized, e.g., Greek).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer human-readable description explaining the discount policy, purpose and business rules.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount policy is currently active (True/False).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the discount policy was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Identifier or username of the user or system that created the record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent modification to the discount policy.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Identifier or username of the user or system that last modified the record.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Discount rate expressed as a percentage (e.g., 10.000 means 10%). Nullable if the policy uses a fixed amount or other rule.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed discount amount (currency). Nullable when percentage-based or when no fixed amount applies. Currency unit in source is USD.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Serialized business rule or expression that determines applicability of this discount (e.g., rule language or JSON).

columns.name: ApplyToUnit
columns.description: Flag indicating if the discount applies per unit rather than per line or order (True/False).

columns.name: Bundle1Discount
columns.description: Configured discount value for bundle tier 1. Often nullable; used when bundle-specific discounts are defined.

columns.name: Bundle2Discount
columns.description: Configured discount value for bundle tier 2. Nullable when not used.

columns.name: Bundle3Discount
columns.description: Configured discount value for bundle tier 3. Nullable when not used.

columns.name: Bundle4Discount
columns.description: Configured discount value for bundle tier 4. Nullable when not used.

columns.name: BundleOtherDiscount
columns.description: Fallback discount for bundle types not explicitly listed. Nullable when not used.

columns.name: MaxApplicableDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that can be applied by default (business cap). Nullable when no cap is set.

columns.name: MaxSupervisorDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that a supervisor is allowed to approve. Nullable if not used.

columns.name: MaxAreaManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that an area manager is allowed to approve. Nullable if not used.

columns.name: MaxSalesManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that a sales manager is allowed to approve. Nullable if not used.

columns.name: MaxSalesmanDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that an individual salesperson is allowed to apply. Nullable if not used.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Legacy or integration key used by external data-mapping processes. May be entirely null when not in use.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the legacy/integration table associated with the DMKey for external mapping; often null for modern records.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character-based legacy key for data mapping and integration scenarios; frequently null.

columns.name: Product1Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 1. Nullable when not set.

columns.name: Product2Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 2. Nullable when not set.

columns.name: Product3Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 3. Nullable when not set.

columns.name: Product4Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 4. Nullable when not set.

columns.name: ProductOtherDiscount
columns.description: Fallback product-specific discount for products not explicitly mapped to the numbered slots; nullable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique numeric identifier for an advertisement deactivation reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Text description of why an advertisement was deactivated (human-readable reason, often localized).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advertisement sales type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description or code for the sales type (e.g., ST1, ST2).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric reference key for downstream data-model/ETL mapping (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the downstream data-model/ETL target table (often null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data-model/ETL mapping (often null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the archived number record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Business code or numeric value representing the archived number.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the archived number is currently active (True/False).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the archived number record was created.

columns.name: CreateById
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the record; foreign key referencing dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreateByUser
columns.description: Username of the person who created the archived number record.

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier for the rule condition definition; part of the composite primary key and foreign key to dbo.RuleConditionDefinition.ID

columns.name: RuleConditionOperandID
columns.description: Identifier for the operand available to the rule condition; part of the composite primary key and foreign key to dbo.RuleConditionOperand.ID

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bank record

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable bank name or description (localized text)

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the bank is currently active (True = active, False = inactive)

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier for the activity/context to which the attribute mapping applies. Acts as the primary grouping key for the mapping record.

columns.name: OldAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the legacy or source attribute value that is being mapped; represents the original attribute in the old system.

columns.name: NewAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the target attribute in the new system that the old attribute should map to after migration.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Optional identifier for the activity or context associated with this attribute value mapping. Null when mapping is global or not activity-specific.

columns.name: OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the legacy/source attribute value that will be translated during migration to the new system's value.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the target attribute value in the destination system that corresponds to the old/source value.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the migration activity or step that this keyword mapping is associated with. Typically references an activity or job that performed the mapping.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier for the source keyword being mapped as part of the migration. Represents the original keyword code or key.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier for the new attribute value that the source keyword is mapped to during migration. Represents the target value in the destination system.

columns.name: SourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the source record (or entity) that was merged. Used to map original IDs to their merged equivalents in migration or cleanup operations.

columns.name: TargetID
columns.description: Identifier of the target record (or entity) that the source record was merged into. Represents the canonical or surviving ID after the merge.

columns.name: Initial_OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original (old) attribute value to be replaced

columns.name: ReplaceWithAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value that will replace the original value

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the original keyword that should be replaced during migration

columns.name: ReplaceWithKeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword that will replace the original keyword during migration

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Unique identifier of the activity. Part of the composite key for this mapping table and references the activities lookup (represents which activity the attribute value applies to).

columns.name: AttributeValueID
columns.description: Unique identifier of the attribute value assigned to the activity. Part of the composite key for this mapping table and typically references an attribute values dictionary.

columns.name: Activity_ID
columns.description: Primary key for the activity lookup. Numeric identifier used to reference an activity in mappings and related tables.

columns.name: NameGr
columns.description: Activity name in Greek (localized). Stores the Greek-language label for the activity for display in Greek-language contexts.

columns.name: NameEn
columns.description: Activity name in English. Primary human-readable label used for display, search, and sorting in English-language contexts.

attributes.name: GeoAreaId
attributes.description: Surrogate or external code identifying the geographic area (e.g. S80125)

attributes.name: Name_ΟΝΟΜΑΣΤΙΚΗ
attributes.description: Primary (nominative) name of the geographic area in Greek

attributes.name: Name_ΓΕΝΙΚΗ
attributes.description: Alternate (genitive) form of the geographic area name (mostly empty in sample)

attributes.name: specifiers
attributes.description: Additional qualifiers or specifiers for the area name (e.g., administrative qualifiers)

attributes.name: Concatenate Name
attributes.description: Pre-composed display name for the geographic area (recommended label for UI)

attributes.name: AttributeId
attributes.description: Identifier of the attribute/category (e.g. 155)

attributes.name: AttributeType
attributes.description: Type code classifying the attribute (small set of type codes)

attributes.name: AttributeName
attributes.description: Logical name of the attribute (e.g. Internet_Cities); can be used to group values

attributes.name: AttributeLanguageId
attributes.description: Language code for the attribute (e.g. 1032)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the attribute value (unique per attribute/value)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human-readable value/label for the attribute (often localized text)

attributes.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
attributes.description: Language code for the attribute value (may match AttributeLanguageId)

attributes.name: ActiveUdacPartDefinitionCodes
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of UDAC part definition codes where this attribute value is active (nullable)

attributes.name: ID
attributes.description: Surrogate key for the calendar row

attributes.name: CalendarDate
attributes.description: Full calendar date (stored as DATETIME)

attributes.name: Year
attributes.description: Calendar year extracted from CalendarDate

attributes.name: MonthName
attributes.description: Month name (e.g., January) extracted from CalendarDate

attributes.name: MonthNumber
attributes.description: Numeric month (1-12) extracted from CalendarDate

attributes.name: DayOfMonth
attributes.description: Day of month extracted from CalendarDate

attributes.name: DayName
attributes.description: Name of the day of the week (e.g., Monday)

attributes.name: IsHoliday
attributes.description: Derived flag indicating whether the date has a holiday description

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Holiday or special day description (Greek text in source)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the star rating (stored as NVARCHAR in source)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Star rating label (e.g., '1 star', '2 stars')

attributes.name: StarCount
attributes.description: Numeric star count parsed from AttributeValue (derived, 1-5)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the star rating value (stored as text).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable star rating in Greek (e.g. '1 αστέρι', '2 αστέρια').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the transaction/interaction type (text numeric id).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable transaction type in Greek (e.g. 'Κάντε κράτηση', 'Κλείστε ραντεβού', 'Online Παραγγελία').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique code identifying the unit type (English view)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human-readable unit type name in English (e.g., 'Hotel', 'Hotel Boutique')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique code identifying the unit type (Greek view)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human-readable unit type name in Greek

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the functional month (stored as string, represents month number 1-12)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English name of the functional month (raw value includes trailing delimiters like '||')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the functional month (stored as string, represents month number 1-12)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Greek name of the functional month (raw value includes trailing delimiters like '||')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the payment way (stored as NVARCHAR). Distinct ~18 values; used to join to fact tables.

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English description/label of the payment way (text). Source contains trailing delimiters '||' in some rows.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the payment way (stored as NVARCHAR). Distinct ~18 values; used to join to fact tables.

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Greek description/label of the payment way (text). Values are in Greek; source contains trailing delimiters '||' in some rows.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier/code for the room keys attribute (stored as text numeric codes).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable label for number of room keys in English (e.g., '1 key', '2 keys').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier/code for the room keys attribute (stored as text numeric codes).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable label for number of room keys in Greek (e.g., '1 κλειδί', '2 κλειδιά').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/code for the arrival time value (string ID from source)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Arrival time in HH:MM format (English view)

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Hour component extracted from AttributeValue (0-23)

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Minute component extracted from AttributeValue (0-59)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/code for the arrival time value (string ID from source)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Arrival time in HH:MM format (Greek view)

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Hour component extracted from AttributeValue (0-23)

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Minute component extracted from AttributeValue (0-59)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/key for the departure time value (string id from source)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Departure time as a HH:mm formatted string (e.g., "00:00")

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Hour component extracted from AttributeValue (0-23)

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Minute component extracted from AttributeValue (0-59)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/key for the departure time value (string id from source)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Departure time as a HH:mm formatted string (e.g., "01:00") — Greek-language view but uses same HH:mm format

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Hour component extracted from AttributeValue (0-23)

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Minute component extracted from AttributeValue (0-59)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the high-season attribute (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: High season label in English (sample values include 'January||', 'February||'). Note: values may include trailing delimiters '||'.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the high-season attribute (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: High season label in Greek (sample values include 'Ιανουάριος||', 'Φεβρουάριος||'). Note: values may include trailing delimiters '||'.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/code for the low-season attribute value (stored as NVARCHAR numeric strings). Unique identifier for the month entry.

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English name of the low-season month. Note: values include a trailing delimiter '||' in the source and may require trimming for display.

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign-salesman assignment rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of unique salesmen assigned to campaigns in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of unique campaigns represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: AvgAssignmentsPerCampaign
measures.description: Average number of salesman assignments per campaign (Assignments / Distinct Campaigns). Null when there are no campaigns in the filter context.

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of payment amounts recorded in this payment method record. Amounts are stored with three decimals but typically reported with two decimals.

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average payment amount per AdvancedPaymentMethod record.

measures.name: Minimum Amount
measures.description: Lowest payment amount observed.

measures.name: Maximum Amount
measures.description: Highest payment amount observed.

measures.name: Payment Count
measures.description: Number of payment method records (rows) in this table.

measures.name: Distinct System Receipt Count
measures.description: Count of distinct system receipt numbers associated with these payment method records. Note: SystemReceiptNumber is nearly unique in the sample.

measures.name: Bank Deposit Count
measures.description: Number of records that include a bank deposit reference (non-null BankDepositNumber). Useful to track payments actually deposited to a bank.

measures.name: Policy Amount (sum)
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount. Field is almost always null in the sample (high null rate) — include with caution as it may not be populated.

measures.name: Payment Count
measures.description: Number of payment method records (row count).

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of Amount for payments. Amount stored with three decimal places; displayed with two decimals. Nulls treated as 0 in SUM.

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average payment Amount. Note: many rows may be null for Amount in different snapshots; review null handling in queries.

measures.name: Total Policy Amount
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount when present. High null rate in source; may be NULL for most records.

measures.name: Average Policy Amount
measures.description: Average PolicyAmount across records where PolicyAmount is populated. Use with caution because PolicyAmount is largely null in this snapshot.

measures.name: Average Credit Card Installments
measures.description: Average number of credit card installments per record (when CreditCardInstallments is populated). High null rate; typically only present for credit-card payments.

measures.name: Credit Card Installment Records
measures.description: Number of records with a populated CreditCardInstallments value.

measures.name: Distinct System Receipt Count
measures.description: Count of distinct SystemReceiptNumber values. Many SystemReceiptNumber values are null in this snapshot.

display.notes: Many ancillary columns (check fields, credit card details, deposit dates, PolicyAmount) have very high null rates in this snapshot. Use PaymentMethodTypeID and BankID as primary slice keys for analysis. Consider joining to dimension tables (DimPaymentMethodType, DimBank, DimCreditCardType) for readable labels.

measures.name: AssociationCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (associations) between advanced payment methods and sales collections.

measures.name: DistinctSalesCollections
measures.description: Number of distinct sales collections that are linked to advanced payment methods.

measures.name: DistinctAdvancedPaymentMethods
measures.description: Number of distinct advanced payment methods used across sales collections.

measures.name: Ad Count
measures.description: Number of advertisement records (rows) in the fact.

measures.name: Active Ad Count
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN AdvEndDate IS NULL THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of ads that do not have an end date (treated as active).

measures.name: Distinct Product Count
measures.description: Count of distinct products referenced by the advertisements.

measures.name: Total Price
measures.description: Sum of the Price column across advertisements. Currency hinted as USD.

measures.name: Average Price
measures.description: Average Price per advertisement.

measures.name: Total Discount
measures.description: Sum of the explicit Discount amounts applied to advertisements.

measures.name: Total Rules Discount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied by rules for the advertisements.

measures.name: Total Additional Discounts
measures.description: Combined sum of payment, product and bundle discounts (nulls treated as 0).

measures.name: Total All Discounts
measures.description: Total of all discount types combined per advertisement (row-level sum aggregated).

measures.name: Net Revenue (approx)
measures.expression: SUM(Price - Discount - RulesDiscount - ISNULL(PaymentDiscount,0) - ISNULL(ProductDiscount,0) - ISNULL(BundleDiscount,0))
measures.description: Estimated net revenue per advertisement after subtracting discounts. Uses row-level subtraction and then aggregates.

measures.name: Discount Rate (by amount)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Price) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(Discount) / NULLIF(SUM(Price),0) END
measures.description: Proportion of total Discount relative to total Price. Null when total Price is zero.

measures.name: Total One-Time Amount
measures.description: Sum of OneTimeAmount across advertisements (nulls treated as 0).

measures.name: Total Extra Fee Amount
measures.description: Sum of ExtraFeeAmount across advertisements (nulls treated as 0).

measures.name: Total Budget Amount
measures.description: Sum of BudgetAmount where provided (nulls treated as 0).

measures.name: Total Actual Spent Budget
measures.description: Sum of ActualSpentBudget; may be sparsely populated.

measures.name: Altered Amount Total
measures.description: Sum of AlteredAmount values (mostly null for this dataset).

measures.name: Altered PPC Amount After CC Total
measures.description: Sum of AlteredPPCAmountAfterCC (mostly null for this dataset).

measures.name: Average Months
measures.description: Average value of Months field (sparse; nulls ignored).

measures.name: Verified Ad Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements flagged as verified.

measures.name: Subscription-Based Ad Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements flagged as subscription-based.

measures.name: Average Active Duration (days)
measures.description: Average duration in days between AdvBeginDate and AdvEndDate; where end date is missing current date is used.

measures.name: TotalEvents
measures.description: Total number of recorded extraction events (one row per event).

measures.name: DistinctEventTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct event types observed in the history.

measures.name: FirstEventTime
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest recorded extraction event.

measures.name: LastEventTime
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent recorded extraction event.

measures.name: AverageEventsPerDay
measures.description: Average number of extraction events per calendar day over the selected period.

measures.name: Type_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Type = 0. Useful when breaking down activity by event type.

measures.name: Type_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Type = 1. Useful when breaking down activity by event type.

measures.name: Type_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Type = 2. Useful when breaking down activity by event type.

measures.name: Status_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Status = 0. Interpret status codes using upstream documentation (0 often indicates success).

measures.name: Status_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Status = 1. Interpret status codes using upstream documentation (may indicate failure or alternate state).

measures.name: DepositCount
measures.description: Number of deposit detail records (rows) in the result set or aggregation.

measures.name: UniqueDepositNumberCount
measures.description: Count of distinct BankDepositNumber values (unique deposit identifiers) in the aggregation.

measures.name: EarliestDepositDate
measures.description: Earliest BankDepositDate in the aggregation (first deposit timestamp).

measures.name: LatestDepositDate
measures.description: Latest BankDepositDate in the aggregation (most recent deposit timestamp).

measures.name: DepositSpanDays
measures.description: Span in days between the earliest and latest deposit within the aggregation.

measures.name: AverageDepositsPerBank
measures.description: Average number of deposit detail records per bank within the aggregation (total deposits divided by distinct banks).

measures.name: Action Count
measures.description: Total number of batch action history records (rows).

measures.name: Distinct Batch Count
measures.description: Number of distinct batches referenced by these actions.

measures.name: Rows Affected (Sum)
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all batch actions.

measures.name: Rows Affected (Average)
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per action.

measures.name: Rows Affected (Max)
measures.description: Maximum number of rows affected in a single action.

measures.name: Rows Affected (Min)
measures.description: Minimum number of rows affected in a single action.

measures.name: Successful Actions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions with Status = 1 (interpreted as success).

measures.name: Failed Actions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions with Status = 0 (interpreted as failure or not successful).

measures.name: Success Rate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), COUNT(ID))
measures.description: Proportion of actions that succeeded (Status = 1) out of total actions.

measures.name: Actions of Type 1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BatchActionType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions where BatchActionType = 1 (useful when action types are small in cardinality). Replace the literal to create measures for other types as needed.
